of the 67 municipalities of Chihuahua, in northern Mexico. The municipal seat is Juan Aldama. The municipality covers an area of 9,835.9 kmÂ². In 2010, the municipality had a total population of 22,302. == References == Category:Municipalities of Chihuahua
